title: Searching for an English speaking Teamspeak 3 Server :D
body:
**Heeeey Buddys**

I would like to play with people who can speak English, so I can improve my English more. I didn't find anything on the internet, so I'm quite lost ;__;
Skype, Teamspeak 3, Mumble......everything is possible and ok for me. :D
18 years old, from the far away and dangerous land called "Germany", (but I sound like a little girl, so I'm really sorry for that :@)
Playing EU West ;)


Help is highly appreciated <3 

Happy Hunting
19Lynx97 :3

replies.body: Nur bl√∂d dass das hier der deutschsprachige Teil der LoL-Foren ist.
Ohhh verdammt xD dann versuch ich es woanders, aber trotzdem danke :D
